name: Education Programs System
description: The term education system generally refers to public schooling, not private schooling, and more commonly to kindergarten through high school programs. Schools or school districts are typically the smallest recognized form of “education system” and countries are the largest.

name: Drawing Classes
description: Find out more about what the School Games is and the people behind it; ... Sport England to deliver the School Games programme for three days a week.

name: Labs Programs
description: Children are never identified in any observations; should photos or footage of children ever be considered for other than in-house educational use, your permission would be requested.
